keyword: how many calories are in a large mcdonalds french fry
title: How Many Calories in a Large McDonald's French Fry?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a large McDonald's French fry serving—about 510 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and quick tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in a Large McDonald's French Fry?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's large French fries (154 g serving), deep-fried in vegetable oil blend; values based on official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and portion size. Check McDonald's app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A large McDonald's French fries serving contains about 510 calories and 66 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a large McDonald's French fry?
What are the carbs in large McDonald's fries?
faqs.a: About 66 g total carbs, including 6 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a large McDonald's French fry?
faqs.a: 24 g total fat, with 3.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Do large McDonald's fries have protein?
faqs.a: Yes, around 7 g per large serving.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a large McDonald's French fry?
